Subjects: political poems; Edward IV, return of
_description: The Battle of Barnet — four 8-line stanzas, with refrain, ‘Conuertimini ye comons and drede your kyng / For now regneth ryghtwysly oure souerayn’

CamTCC601.First Lines:
Gaudete iusti in dominoffor now regneth ryghtwysly oure
                    souerayn…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…Ye that be hys frendys yow prestys to prayConuertimini
                    ye comons and drede your kyng
CamTCC601.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         130 (1913): 286-311: 309.
